overview: Pete Allen is a telematics industry executive who brings more than 20+ years of operations, sales, account management and customer experience to Cadec. Pete was previously Senior Vice President Global Sales at telematics company inthinc. He has also served in senior executive roles at GreenRoad Technologies (formerly Drive Diagnostics) and XATA Corporation. Earlier in his career, Pete was a sales manager with Cadec, and the top sales person for three of his four years there. He holds a BS from Marietta College.
